title: Inception
overview: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets from their subconscious.

title: Oldboy
overview: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

title: Joker
overview: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.

title: Dead Poets Society
overview: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.
